content: CPF Asked by AnonymousAsked on 05 Jul 2019If I have more than $60000 combined in CPF?The first 60000 I will earn additional 1% every year if my account grows?1% = $600 extra a year1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Elijah Lee, Independent Financial Advisor at Phillip Securities (Jurong East Lite)Top Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered on 05 Jul 2019I'm assuming you are below 55. If that is so, the first $40K in your SA earns an extra 1% which is credited back to your SA, and the first $20K in your OA earns an extra 1% which is credited to your SA as well. So it will be an extra $600/yr.0 comments3
